title: Head of Marketing (Real Estate Experience) Job at UnoCasa Limited
content:
UnoCasa is a full service Human Resources Consultancy business with focus on Talent Acquisition, Learning & Development and Consultancy services. Our raison d’etre is the notion that your people are your advantage and proffer people-centric solutions to ensure your team accomplish your business goals.

We are not your run of the mill HR Company, we believe in team diversity and teamwork; we believe that the workplace should have an ambience that inspires productivity of the team; and the application of technologies to enhance efficiency. We know that every business is unique and tailor HR solutions to your organisation’s needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Position: Head of Marketing (Real Estate Experience)

Job Location: Ilupeju, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The Head of Marketing is responsible for leading the overall marketing strategy of Heritage Homes, with a strong focus on real estate campaigns, digital visibility, and on-ground lead generation.
	The role oversees both in-house and field marketing activities while coordinating content creation and brand management.


Key Responsibilities


	Develop and implement strategic marketing plans for real estate products.
	Coordinate the efforts of the creative and field marketing teams.
	Collaborate with sales to ensure marketing efforts are generating qualified leads.
	Track ROI on paid campaigns and lead sources.
	Supervise and approve digital content for Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and other platforms.
	Analyze real estate market trends and consumer data to adjust marketing tactics.
	Oversee branding, advertising, and promotional campaigns.
	Coordinate print production, flyers, and traditional real estate promotions.
	Lead strategy for events, expos, open house promotions, and real estate activations.


Requirements


	3 - 5 years of experience in real estate marketing.
	Strong leadership and strategy execution capabilities.
	Experience managing creatives and field marketers.
	Proficiency in digital tools like Meta Ads Manager, Canva, Mailchimp, etc.
	Strong written and verbal communication skills.
	Team player with real estate marketing acumen.


Salary
N300,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:  jobs@unocasaltd.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note: Only qualified candidates will be contacted.

title: Content Creator (Fashion) Job at Elvaridah Limited
content:
Elvaridah Limited - Our client is a contemporary lifestyle and fashion brand rooted in Nigeria’s rich textile heritage representing a bold evolution—blending tradition with modernity to deliver premium, stylish, and culturally inspired pieces for today’s fashion-forward individuals. With a commitment to quality, creativity, and craftsmanship, they offer curated collections that speak to elegance, individuality, and innovation. The brand is dedicated to providing an exceptional customer experience, from personalized styling to a seamless retail journey, positioning itself as a leading name in Nigeria’s evolving fashion and lifestyle space.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Position: Content Creator (Fashion)

Job Location: Lagos Island, Lagos

Job Summary


	We are looking for a versatile and proactive Executive Assistant / Content Creator to support executive operations while developing engaging content across digital platforms.
	This hybrid role is ideal for a creative thinker with strong organizational skills who can handle administrative tasks efficiently and bring the brand to life through compelling storytelling, visuals, and content strategies.


Key Responsibilities
Executive Assistant Duties:


	Manage schedules, appointments, and meetings.
	Prepare reports, presentations, and documents as needed
	Handle correspondence, emails, and calls with professionalism
	Support daily operations and liaise with internal and external stakeholders
	Maintain confidentiality and discretion in all matters


Content Creation Duties:


	Develop and execute content strategies aligned with brand aesthetics and goals
	Create high-quality visual and written content for social media, newsletters, blog posts, and website
	Plan and manage content calendars, ensuring timely and consistent publishing
	Capture behind-the-scenes content, product features, and brand campaigns
	Collaborate with design, marketing, and sales teams to bring campaigns to life
	Track engagement metrics and suggest improvements based on analytics


Requirements


	Candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree in Communications, Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field
	2+ years of experience in a similar role (admin or content creation), preferably within fashion / lifestyle
	Strong written and verbal communication skills
	Proficiency in Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or other design tools
	Familiarity with social media platforms (Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, etc.)
	Strong organizational, multitasking, and time-management skills
	High level of discretion and professionalism.


Salary
N120,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Portfolio to: careers@elvaridah.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Sales Deposit Manager Job at Boctrust Microfinance Bank
content:
Boctrust Microfinance Bank is a financial institution licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria to give social and economic Support to the lower middle class, working class and the economically active poor.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Deposit Manager
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Develop and execute strategic plans to achieve and exceed savings deposit growth targets.
	Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify opportunities for new savings products and service enhancements.
	Manage and mentor a team of savings deposit officers, providing guidance, training, and performance feedback.
	Develop and implement customer retention strategies to minimise attrition.
	Implement and monitor effective sales and marketing campaigns to attract new savings customers.
	Ensure compliance with all relevant regulatory requirements and internal policies related to deposit mobilisation.
	Maintain strong relationships with existing customers and proactively address their needs and concerns.
	Monitor and analyse key performance indicators (KPIs) related to savings deposits and provide regular reports to senior management.
	Collaborate with other departments, such as marketing, product development, and customer service, to ensure a seamless customer experience.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's degree in Banking and Finance, Business Administration, Economics, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 years of progressive experience in retail banking, with a focus on deposit mobilisation and management.
	Proven track record of achieving and exceeding savings deposit growth targets.
	Strong understanding of the Nigerian financial market, regulatory landscape, and competitive environment.
	Excellent leadership, communication, interpersonal, and negotiation skills.
	Demonstrated ability to develop and implement effective sales and marketing strategies.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
	Proficiency in relevant banking software such as bankone and Microsoft Office Suite.
	Excellent customer service orientation.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@boctrustmfb.com using "Savings Deposit Manager" as the subject of the email.
